llm_res.rule: The `balanceOf` function MUST return the actual balance of the token type requested.
transfer function should return true on success.
The `TransferSingle` event MUST be emitted when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers as well as minting or burning.

decimals - Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
